# Dependency Loading Docs

## Dependency loading

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/overview.md): Overview of managed and unmanaged dependency loading in .NET 5+ and .NET Core
- [Understand AssemblyLoadContext](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/understanding-assemblyloadcontext.md): Key concepts to understand the purpose and behavior of AssemblyLoadContext in .NET.

## Dependency loading details

- [Default dependency probing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/default-probing.md): Overview of .NET Core's System.Runtime.Loader.AssemblyLoadContext.Default probing logic to locate dependencies.
- [Load managed assemblies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/loading-managed.md): Description of the details of the managed assembly loading algorithm in .NET Core
- [Load satellite assemblies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/loading-resources.md): Description of the details of the Satellite assembly loading algorithm in .NET Core
- [Load unmanaged libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/loading-unmanaged.md): Description of the details of the unmanaged assembly loading algorithm in .NET.
- [Collect detailed assembly loading information](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/collect-details.md): Description of how to collect assembly loading information in .NET Core
